pages.text: Sulfur trioxide is another step in $(l:gas/sulfuric_acid)Sulfuric Acid$(/l) production. It is produced by combining $(l:gas/sulfur_dioxide)Sulfur Dioxide$(/l) and $(l:gas/oxygen)Oxygen$(/l) in a $(l:block/chemical_infuser)Chemical Infuser$(/l).
It is combined with $(l:gas/water_vapor)Water Vapor$(/l) in a Chemical Infuser to create sulfuric acid.
